Package cs3500.easyanimator.util

Interface AnimationBuilder<Doc>

Type Parameters:
Doc - An unspecified type.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimationModelImpl.Builder
public interface AnimationBuilder<Doc>
An animation builder for any type to create an animation model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AnimationBuilder<Doc> addKeyframe​(java.lang.String name, int t, int x, int y, int w, int h, int r, int g, int b)
    Adds an individual keyframe to the growing document.
    AnimationBuilder<Doc> addMotion​(java.lang.String name, int t1, int x1, int y1, int w1, int h1, int r1, int g1, int b1, int t2, int x2, int y2, int w2, int h2, int r2, int g2, int b2)
    Adds a transformation to the growing document.
    Doc build()
    Constructs a final document.
    AnimationBuilder<Doc> declareShape​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type)
    Adds a new shape to the growing document.
    AnimationBuilder<Doc> setBounds​(int x, int y, int width, int height)
    Specify the bounding box to be used for the animation.

  • Method Details

    • build

      Doc build()
      Constructs a final document.
      Returns:
      the newly constructed document

    • setBounds

      AnimationBuilder<Doc> setBounds​(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Specify the bounding box to be used for the animation.
      Parameters:
      x - The leftmost x value
      y - The topmost y value
      width - The width of the bounding box
      height - The height of the bounding box
      Returns:
      This AnimationBuilder

    • declareShape

      AnimationBuilder<Doc> declareShape​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type)
      Adds a new shape to the growing document.
      Parameters:
      name - The unique name of the shape to be added. No shape with this name should already exist.
      type - The type of shape (e.g. "ellipse", "rectangle") to be added. The set of supported shapes is unspecified, but should include "ellipse" and "rectangle" as a minimum.
      Returns:
      This AnimationBuilder

    • addMotion

      AnimationBuilder<Doc> addMotion​(java.lang.String name, int t1, int x1, int y1, int w1, int h1, int r1, int g1, int b1, int t2, int x2, int y2, int w2, int h2, int r2, int g2, int b2)
      Adds a transformation to the growing document.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the shape (added with declareShape(java.lang.String, java.lang.String))
      t1 - The start time of this transformation
      x1 - The initial x-position of the shape
      y1 - The initial y-position of the shape
      w1 - The initial width of the shape
      h1 - The initial height of the shape
      r1 - The initial red color-value of the shape
      g1 - The initial green color-value of the shape
      b1 - The initial blue color-value of the shape
      t2 - The end time of this transformation
      x2 - The final x-position of the shape
      y2 - The final y-position of the shape
      w2 - The final width of the shape
      h2 - The final height of the shape
      r2 - The final red color-value of the shape
      g2 - The final green color-value of the shape
      b2 - The final blue color-value of the shape
      Returns:
      This AnimationBuilder

    • addKeyframe

      AnimationBuilder<Doc> addKeyframe​(java.lang.String name, int t, int x, int y, int w, int h, int r, int g, int b)
      Adds an individual keyframe to the growing document.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the shape (added with declareShape(java.lang.String, java.lang.String))
      t - The time for this keyframe
      x - The x-position of the shape
      y - The y-position of the shape
      w - The width of the shape
      h - The height of the shape
      r - The red color-value of the shape
      g - The green color-value of the shape
      b - The blue color-value of the shape
      Returns:
      This AnimationBuilder
